mapper.select: select id, merchant_code, merchant_name, legal_person_name, legal_person_id_card, company_name, credit_code, company_tel, address, trading_certificate_first_file_name, trading_certificate_first_file_url, trading_certificate_second_file_name, trading_certificate_second_file_url, trading_certificate_third_file_name, trading_certificate_third_file_url, business_license_file_name, business_license_file_url, legal_person_id_card_file_name, legal_person_id_card_file_url, auditor, contact_phone, password, salt, registered_person, status, qualification_apply_status, remark, create_time from merchant where status != 0 and merchant_code = #{merchantCode}

SELECT mo.merchant_order_code as orderCode, os.status_name as statusName, mo.grand_total as grandTotal, cu.client_user_name as userName, cop.create_time as orderTime, cop.creator as receiver, mos.create_time as processingTime FROM merchant_order mo JOIN client_order_personal cop ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id JOIN client_user cu ON cop.client_user_id = cu.id JOIN order_status os ON mo.order_status_id = os.id LEFT JOIN merchant_order_status mos ON mo.id = mos.merchant_order_id AND mos.merchant_status_id = 1
AND mo.order_status_id = #{orderStatus} AND (mo.merchant_order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') OR cu.client_user_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') OR cop.creator LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%'))
ORDER BY mo.create_time DESC

SELECT mo.merchant_order_code as orderCode, os.status_name as orderStatus, mo.create_time as orderTime, mo.grand_total as grandTotal, mo.remark as remark, moi.module_name as moduleName, moi.module_pic_url as modulePicUrl, moi.product_code as productCode, moi.quantity as quantity, moi.product_price as productPrice, moi.delivery_time as deliveryTime FROM merchant_order mo JOIN merchant_order_item moi ON mo.id = moi.merchant_order_id JOIN order_status os ON mo.order_status_id = os.id WHERE mo.merchant_order_code = #{orderCode} AND mo.merchant_id = #{merchantId}

SELECT cosa.receiver_name as receiverName, cosa.receiver_phone_number as number, cosa.address_alias as addressAlias, CONCAT(cosa.province_name,cosa.city_name,cosa.area_name,cosa.detail_address) as address FROM client_order_shipping_address cosa JOIN client_order_personal cop ON cop.order_shipping_id = cosa.id JOIN merchant_order mo ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id WHERE mo.merchant_order_code = #{orderCode}

SELECT mos.creator as creator, mos.create_time as createTime, ec.company_name as companyName, mol.logistisc_company_name as logistiscCompanyName, mol.number as number, mol.delivery_person as deliveryPerson, mol.delivery_phone_number as deliveryPhoneNumber, mol.shipment_file_info as shipmentFileInfo FROM merchant_order_status mos JOIN merchant_order mo ON mos.merchant_order_id = mo.id LEFT JOIN merchant_order_logistics mol ON mol.merchant_order_id = mo.id LEFT JOIN express_company ec ON mol.express_company_id = ec.id WHERE mo.merchant_order_code = #{orderCode}

SELECT csf.consignee as consignee, csf.create_time as createTime, csf.sign_file_info as signFileInfo FROM client_sign_for csf LEFT JOIN merchant_order mo ON csf.client_order_id = mo.client_order_id WHERE mo.merchant_order_code = #{orderCode}
SELECT count(1) FROM client_order_personal cop LEFT JOIN merchant_order mo ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id AND cop.`status` != 0 WHERE mo.order_status_id = 2 and mo.client_order_id = #{clientOrderId}
SELECT mo.id FROM client_order_personal cop LEFT JOIN merchant_order mo ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id AND cop.`status` != 0 WHERE mo.client_order_id = #{clientOrderId} limit 1

SELECT mo.merchant_order_code as orderCode, cop.client_order_code as clientOrderCode, m.merchant_name as merchantName, mo.grand_total as grandTotal, os.status_name as orderStatus, mos.creator as processinPerson, mos.create_time as processingTime FROM merchant_order mo LEFT JOIN client_order_personal cop ON mo.client_order_id = cop.id LEFT JOIN merchant m ON mo.merchant_id = m.id JOIN order_status os ON mo.order_status_id = os.id LEFT JOIN merchant_order_status mos ON mo.id = mos.merchant_order_id
AND mo.order_status_id = #{orderStatus} AND (mo.merchant_order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%') OR cop.client_order_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{param},'%'))
ORDER BY mo.create_time DESC
